popularityCurve.label: he took us from being a talented team to being a championship team he got slava fetisov and igor larionov to come here and he put the russian five sergei fedorov larionov slava kozlov fetisov and vladimir konstantinov together he's the one who transformed steve yzerman from a great offensive player to a great two-way player
